Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm.client

[Groovy] Class WinRMClient

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm.client.WinRMClient

    • WinRM client implementation.

      Authors:
      Sergey Korenko

      • Method Detail

        • void cleanupCommand(java.lang.String commandId)

          Stops command execution on a remote host (Ctrl+C).

          Parameters:
          commandId - id of the command which has to be cleaned.

        • CommandOutput commandExecuteResults(java.lang.String commandId)

          Retrieves results of the command execution on a remote host.

          Parameters:
          commandId - identify command id which output/error output will be retrieved.
          Returns:
          CommandOutput containing output, error output, exit code of the command execution on a remote host.

        • boolean deleteShell()

          Deletes shell releasing all resources allocated for the current shell on a remote host.

          Returns:
          true in case of successful shell closing, otherwise false.

        • java.lang.String executeCommand(java.lang.String command, java.lang.String[] args = [])

          Runs remote command in currently open shell.

          Parameters:
          command - command text.
          args - arguments to run command.
          Returns:
          command id corresponds to the transferred command.

        • boolean isConnected()

          Checks if shell is open for command execution on a remote host.

          Returns:
          true if shell has been opened by openShell() method and has not been closed by deleteShell() method, otherwise false.

        • java.lang.String openShell()

          Creates WinRM shell for further execution of remote commands.

          Returns:
          id of the opened shell.
